'''Cannes''' was a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the {{Quest|Deluge of Wrathful Waters}}.

==Profile==
Cannes was one of the survivors of the [[Primordial Sea]]'s encroachment upon [[Poisson]]. In the aftermath, Cannes fells into despair due to the death of his daughter [[Desyree]] in the incident. His name is later listed among the names of the victims of the incident, heavily implying he committed suicide soon after.
